      POST /auth/refresh-token : Refresh the authentication token.
      Parameters:
      refreshTokenRequestDto - (required)
      Returns:
      Token refreshed successfully. (status code 200) or Bad Request. The refresh token is missing or invalid. (status code 400) or Unauthorized. The provided refresh token is expired or revoked. (status code 401) or Forbidden. The request is not authorized (e.g., due to account restrictions). (status code 403) or Not Found. The resource associated with the refresh token could not be found (unlikely, but possible). (status code 404)

      POST /auth/forgot-password : Request a password reset link.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

The input is invalid or missing required fields. (status code 400) or Unauthorized. Invalid authentication provided. (status code 401) or Forbidden. The user does not have permission to perform this action. (status code 403) or Not found. The user does not exist in the system. (status code 404) or Too many requests. Rate limit exceeded. (status code 429) or Internal server error. Something went wrong on the server. (status code 500) or Service unavailable. System is under maintenance or overloaded. (status code 503)
